mapper.select: select muc.id , muc.user_id as userId , muc.contract_id as contractId, muc.number from mdc_user_contract muc join sys_contract sc on sc.id = muc.contract_id where muc.user_id = #{userId} and sc.type = #{type} and muc.del_flag = 0
select count(*) from mdc_user_contract where user_id = #{userId} and del_flag = 0

select ifnull(sum(sc.amount),0) from mdc_user_contract muc join sys_contract sc on sc.id = muc.contract_id where del_flag = 0 and sc.type = 1 and user_id in( select reced_id from sys_user_level where rec_id = #{userId} union select #{userId} )

select ifnull(sum(sc.amount*muc.number),0) from mdc_user_contract muc join sys_contract sc on sc.id = muc.contract_id where del_flag = 0 and sc.type = 2 and user_id in( select reced_id from sys_user_level where rec_id = #{userId} union select #{userId} )
